name: mutiple-upload
description: a pure javascript client for multiple upload

scripts.build: browserify ./index.js -t [ babelify ] -s multiple -d | exorcist ./dist/multiple.js.map | derequire > dist/multiple.js
scripts.transpile:
babel -d lib.es5/ lib/ && replace '^' '// Generated by Babel
' ./lib.es5/*/*.js ./lib.es5/*.js --multiline=false

author: cangbing.guo@upai.com
